name: GMTK game jam 2019 - Shining Star
description:
"It's a scandal! "How dare they add these Lady Mucks to my show? Peasants, all of them! Amateurs who can not even put one foot in front of the other ...! This is my  show, my  hour of glory! I'll show them, who is the real star of this joke!"

Don't let the other contestants steal the spotlight away from you! Drag your ballerina across the screen to gain momentum, then release her to knock out the other dancers of the stage. The more time they spend on the show, the less attention you will get from the public.

Use the environment at your advantage to knock out multiple ballerinas at once and as fast as possible. Keeping their attention up will be increasingly more difficult as the show goes on, but don't give up! Show them you're the only one worth their admiration!

Made for the GMTK game jam 2019.

You can also play the game directly in your browser here :  

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/735892
